tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE traffic_patterns (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    vehicle_count INT,
    congestion_level VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE CongestionData (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id INT,
    congestion_time TIMESTAMP,
    congestion_cause VARCHAR(100),
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES TrafficPatterns(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE EmissionReduction (
    reduction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id INT,
    co2_reduction DECIMAL,
    emission_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES TrafficPatterns(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE traffic_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    vehicle_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    speed_mph INTEGER,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE congestion_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    congestion_level INTEGER,
    weather_conditions VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE traffic_analysis (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    vehicle_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    avg_speed_mph INTEGER,
    congestion_level INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE emissions_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    vehicle_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    co2_emissions DECIMAL(10,2),
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);
